concept.shortdesc: (Non-normative) Many members of the OASIS DITA Technical Committee participated in the creation of this specification and are gratefully acknowledged.

conbody.p: Michael Priestley from IBM had the original idea of Lightweight DITA and has chaired or co-chaired the Lightweight DITA subcommittee with OASIS since its foundation in 2014.
